explains: adv. 怪诞地；奇异地；可怕地

sentences.en: Monrovia after the fighting is eerily quiet.
sentences.cn: 战斗之后，蒙罗维亚可怕地安静。

sentences.en: Distant creaks and groans echoed eerily along the dark corridors.
sentences.cn: 远处嘎吱嘎吱的声音回响在漆黑的走廊里，怪可怕的。

sentences.en: The vast volcanic slope was eerily reminiscent of a lunar landscape.
sentences.cn: 巨大的火山坡很奇怪地让人想起月球上的景观。
